summary: This is an email exchange from February 2019 discussing scheduling team meetings related to the Epstein case. The sender expresses frustration with the Epstein team's perceived lack of speed and suggests a meeting to understand the situation.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses the 'Epstein team' and their perceived lack of speed in handling cases.

events.title: Email exchange about Epstein team meetings
events.description: An email exchange occurs where the sender expresses annoyance with the Epstein team's lack of speed and proposes scheduling team meetings to discuss the situation.

keyFacts: The document is an email exchange dated February 11, 2019.
The sender expresses frustration that the 'Epstein team' is not moving with expected speed.
The sender proposes scheduling team meetings to understand what is happening with the Epstein-related cases.
